channel.title: Webclient Help
channel.description:
So for the past two days, I've been working on a webclient for my server. After fixing my cache downloader, i got my webclient to work.
Encrypted

NOTE: Donations are highly apprecited!
Register on our forums at http://encrypted.freeforums.org!

I put the above code into a notepad, saved it as an html file, than ran it through my computer. The result was successful. but when I put that same html code in a webhost, and published, i get an error. Any idea on how to fix?

item.title: Webclient Help
item.dc:creator: @Devinhdl Devinhdl
item.description:
@Devinhdl wrote:

lolz that wasn’t even the problem. Thanks for taking you’r time and trying to help though. I got my webclient working now and I feel so stupid lolz

Read full topic
